title: Five on Finniston Farm. Five get into a fix
brief_description: In the first of these two adventures the Famous Five are on holiday at Finniston Farm, where they meet Harry and Harriet (who are identical twins). They join forces with the twins against some unpleasant American visitors who are interested in the dungeons of Finniston Castle. In the second adventure, the Five are on holiday at a farm in Wales, after their trip to Switzerland is cancelled. They uncover a mystery when they start to investigate a mysterious tower.
